text: @JoeBiden I totally agree, we can't take 4 more years of this. If you are insinuating that President Trump, who wasn't impeached, had something to do with the world outbreak of Covid-19 and the death of Mr. Floyd... well you're an idiot. It could have happened to anyone at that desk.
